people_also_ask.heading: PLAY FOR FREE 3 and up. Requires iOS 8.0 or later. Compatible with iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch.
people_also_ask.title: Amazing Katamari Damacy - Paladin Studios

people_also_ask.question: Is Katamari Damacy an indie game?
people_also_ask.heading: This madcap question forms the narrative of Katamari Damacy, an indie video game released by Namco in 2004. It garnered such a cult following that it was remastered and re-released on Microsoft and Nintendo Switch in 2018, and has been heralded as a form of “liquid anti-cynicism”.20-Feb-2020
people_also_ask.title: This Adorable Video Game Reflects Our Contemporary ...

people_also_ask.question: How long does it take to beat Katamari Damacy?
people_also_ask.heading: When focusing on the main objectives, Katamari Damacy is about 6 Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 10½ Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: How long is Katamari Damacy? | HowLongToBeat

knowledge_panel.description: katamari damacy is a third-person puzzle-action video game developed and published by namco for the playstation 2. it was released in japan in march 2004 and in north america in september 2004. wikipedia
